title: On Mac MSBuild does not accept absolute path on command line
body: An absolute path on Mac OS X starts with a / character, making it look like a switch on the command line. However, the special logic to distinguish absolute path from switches is not enabled on Mac, thus absolute paths on command line are mistaken for switches, causing command line parsing to fail.

nodes.body: Should be fixed with our packages starting with `0.1.0-preview-00015`.
